Masks

I make masks in a range of materials, suited to design and purpose. Leather masks are the highest quality option for performance work. They are light, durable and beautifully responsive under stage or natural lighting.

My 3D printed masks are made with a wood-based bioplastic that offers a really competative vegan option at a slightly more affordable price point.

For more about the mask-making process see the page on
Techniques & Materials

Commedia dell’Arte

Pantalone, Zanni, Arlecchino and more — masks rooted in the Italian tradition of comic archetypes.

Pedagogical

Neutral, larval, and training masks for teaching physical theatre.

Folk & Festival

Traditional folk masks and creations designed for street theatre, ritual, and celebration.

Other

Costume masks, display masks, experiments.
